meanings.sent1: She wore the fabbest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The fabbest outfit at the fashion show caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His fabbest dance move made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the fabbest colors.
meanings.sent5: The fabbest fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: in the most fabulous or stylish manner
meanings.sent1: She danced fabbest at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The models walked down the runway fabbest.
meanings.sent3: He sang fabbest when he thought no one was listening.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed fabbest in the spring sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The party decorations sparkled fabbest under the lights.
